content:
Hi everyone!

I just went through the list of my assigned PRs. In order to not let people wait any longer than necessary, it would probably be wise to reassign them. (I can't reassign nor merge them anymore).

These I have not yet looked at so they should certainly be reassigned:

  • "Take 2: Add take_... functions to slices" - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/77065
  • "Split each iterator adapter and source into individual modules" - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/77697
  • "Refactor and fix parse_prefix on Windows" - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78833

Here, the next steps are unclear (wait for improved pattern API?):

  • "Implement String::remove_matches" - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71780

And this one needs a decision (FCP?):

  • "Format Duration microseconds with 'us' suffix, without Unicode" - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/75065

Thank you all!

I found two more:

  • "Doc change: Remove mention of fnv in HashMap" - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/77996
  • "Add a way to limit inheritable handles when spawning child process on Windows" - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/75551

"Doc change: Remove mention of fnv in HashMap" - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/77996

this one is ready to go I think

Thanks @Lukas Kalbertodt ! I'll look at them.

I can't reassign

(I think r? @someone will still work.)

Mara said:

I can't reassign

(I think r? @someone will still work.)

I thought so, too, but apparently it doesn't: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78769#issuecomment-725933943

Oh, that looks like a bug then. The highfive bot specifically has a check to allow the current assignee to use that command. It should only check your access the the repository if you're not the author or assignee.
@Joshua Nelson thanks. that one is approved now. :)
